hdmi: Yes, Type C mini-pin HDMI connector
whitebalancing: Auto, Incandescent, Fluorescent (7 Types), Direct Sunlight, Flash, Cloudy, Shade, Preset Manual, White Balance Presets (12), Custom White Balance
imageformat: JPEG, NEF (RAW), NEF (RAW) JPEG, EXIF 2.3, DCF 2.0, DPOF ( Fine, Normal, Basic Quality )
externalflash: Yes, Hot-shoe, Wireless plus sync connector
dustreduction: Yes, Image sensor cleaning, Image Dust Off reference data (optional Capture NX 2 software required)
flashmodes: Auto, auto with red-eye reduction, auto slow sync, auto slow sync with red-eye reduction, fill-flash, red-eye reduction, slow sync, slow sync with red-eye reduction, rear-curtain with slow sync, rear-curtain sync, off
builtinflash: Yes, Auto, portrait, child, close up, night portrait: Auto flash with auto pop-upP, S, A, M: Manual pop-up with button release
display: 3.0 inch TFT LCD with 160 viewing angle
